mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product_reply (product_id, replyer, reply) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{replyer}, #{reply})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.id id, r.product_id product_id, r.replyer replyer, r.reply reply, r.reply_date reply_date, r.update_date update_date, m.username replyer_name
FROM tbl_product_reply r JOIN tbl_member m ON r.replyer = m.userid
WHERE r.product_id = #{product_id}
ORDER BY r.id ASC
